features.title: USAID/GeoCenter
features.details: Senior GIS Analyst and YouthMappers Activity Manager at the USAID/GeoCenter.

features.title: Creative Associates International
features.details: Manager, Geospatial and Data Services at Creative Associates.

features.title: Apple Maps
features.details: GIS Technician working on Apple Maps' data pipeline.

features.title: Urban Ecology Institute
features.details: GIS Intern working on designing Boston's first ever Street Tree Census.

features.title: University of Twente (ITC)
features.details: M.Sc. in Geoinforamtion Science and Earth Observation.

features.title: iMMAP
features.details: Supported the Iraq Government on its humanitarian demining efforts.

features.title: Accenture
features.details: Supported the Department of State's Acquisitions Bureau.

features.title: George Washington University
features.details: Studie International Relations with a concentration in Conflict and Security.

features.title: Madrid, Spain
features.details: I graduated high school in Madrid, fell in love with Real Madrid, jamon iberico and botellons.

features.title: Budapest Part II
features.details: We returned to Budapest where I finished Middle School and started High School.

features.title: Manila, Philippines
features.details: I lived in Manila for two years while my father was posted as a diplomat. I made the little league all-star team both years and was third in the league for doubles.

features.title: Budapest, Hungary
features.details: Next the family was in Budapest. I started kindergarten and learned to love Goulash and Hungarian café culture...I bet I could win any Esterházy eating contest.

features.title: McLean, Virginia
features.details: We returned to the U.S. were I got my first real dose of American culture. I loved playing football with the neighborhood kids, lisenting to my boombox, playing Age of Empires and Civ and watching South Park, the Simpsons and SNL.

features.title: Arlington, Virginia
features.details: I lived in Arlington, Virginia while my father studied hungarian at the Foreign Service Institute. I got to ride the metro and loved memorizing which side of the car the doors would open.

features.title: Montevideo, Uruguay
features.details: Spent the next three years in Montevideo, Uruguay where I enjoyed visiting the zoo, sword fighing with my friends and playing with the family dog Calaban.

features.title: Born in Santiago, Chile
features.details: Born on a rainy day in Santiago, Chile when my father was posted as Foreign Service Officer.

features.title: George Washington University
features.details: George Washington University, B.S. in International Relations.
